summary: This document is a financial statement from Fifth Third Bank for a business account covering the period from June 1, 2017, to June 30, 2017. It details account balances, service charges, and criteria for waiving fees, indicating the financial status of the account during that time.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the relationship manager for the business banking account detailed in the statement.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $231.26 and an ending balance of $231.26 for the statement period.
The standard monthly service charge was waived due to not meeting the balance criteria.
The document outlines overdraft coverage policies effective May 2, 2017.
The business did not meet the criteria for a total combined monthly average balance of $3,500.
The business also did not spend at least $500 per month on its business credit card.
